name: In the peace of angels
description:
Erwin Rommel, a colonel who died in 1944, goes to heaven, but finds himself in someone who is not himself.

A statue speaks to him, he is revealed to have switched bodies with a Muslim. Will he enjoy himself as he did in life in paradise?

How much second can you survive? In the comments send a screen of your record!

Tutorial:
AD -  Move

F - Continue with the dialogue

SX mouse - Shoot
